li.label: changed
li.description: I'm so heavy, and this trunk gets in the way.

li.label: changed
li.description: Wow, this is so great I think I might let out a TOOT!

li.label: changed
li.description: I bet I'd be even bigger as a full elephant, you know.

li.label: reverted
li.description: I think I'll celebrate... with a salad.

li.label: reverted
li.description: I feel much smaller now. This is the opposite of what I wanted!

li.label: Elephant foot
li.description: My feet look like stumps. At least I don't have toes to stub anymore.

li.label: Elephant foot
li.description: Stomp! Stomp! Stomp! I will trample my enemies!

li.label: Elephant foot
li.description: Curse these massive feet! I feel like I am going to put a hole in the floor.
